'''Accelgor''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''アギルダー''' ''Agilder'') is a {{type|Bug}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation V]].

It [[Evolution|evolves]] from {{p|Shelmet}} when [[trade]]d for a {{p|Karrablast}}, which evolves into {{p|Escavalier}} simultaneously. Neither evolves if at least one holds an [[Everstone]] during the trade.

==Biology==
Accelgor has a large pink head reminiscent of a {{wp|helmet}} that is curled in the back. Green stripes run from its eyes to the top of its head, and there is a black star-like marking or hole on the front. Its eyes are hidden in a shadowed crevice in its head. The rest of its body is covered by a dull blue, cloth-like membrane, which keeps Accelgor from dehydrating, with ribbon-like extensions at the top of its back. Its arms, when crossed, portray an aggressive mood. It is a very fast Pokémon; it can attack using ways similar to ninjas. It lives in moist habitats like bogs and swamps.

==In the anime==
[[File:Shulin Accelgor.png|thumb|250px|left|Accelgor in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
===Major appearances===
Accelgor debuted in ''[[BW057|The Mighty Accelguard to the Rescue!]]'', under the ownership of [[Charles]]. Charles used Accelgor during [[Dr. Ferrara|Cryogonal Man]]'s attempt to rob [[Cold Storage]], during which Accelgor showed off its abilities. It was able to defeat Cryogonal Man's powerful {{p|Vanillish}} in battle.

{{an|Bianca}}'s {{p|Shelmet}} evolved into an Accelgor in ''[[BW063|Evolution Exchange Excitement!]]'', after being traded with [[Professor Juniper]] for her {{p|Karrablast}}.

===Minor appearances===
[[Shulin]] has an Accelgor, which debuted in ''[[XY109|Master Class Choices!]]''. It was seen participating in the [[Fleurrh City]] [[Pokémon Showcase]]. Shulin used Accelgor alongside {{p|Escavalier}}, where they had to round up the most {{p|Rhyhorn}}. They were able to do so and make it into the Freestyle Performance. Accelgor reappeared in ''[[XY112|Master Class Is in Session!]]'', where it was used in the {{ci|Gloire}} Master Class Showcase.

==In the manga==
===In the Pokémon Adventures manga===
[[File:Alder Accelgor Adventures.png|thumb|150px|Accelgor in [[Pokémon Adventures]]]]
An Accelgor appeared in ''[[PS483|Special Delivery]]'' as one of the Pokémon competing in {{ci|Nimbasa}}'s [[Pokémon Musical]].

[[Alder]] has an Accelgor which was used to battle [[Marshal]] at the [[Battle Subway]] in ''[[PS486|Unraveling Mysteries]]''.

A Trainer's Accelgor appeared in ''[[PS513|Into the Quarterfinals!]]''.

===In the Pokémon RéBURST manga===
An Accelgor appears as the [[Burst]] form of [[Karuta]]. His father also has an Accelgor, which he can use as his Burst form.

==Trivia==

===Origin===
Accelgor appears to be based on an {{wp|Stock car racing|auto}} {{wp|drag racing|racer}} or a {{wp|ninja}}, combined with a {{wp|giant tube worm}}. Its cloth-like "clothing" and Bug type suggest it may also be based on the {{wp|bagworm moth|bagworm}} pupa.

====Name origin====
Accelgor may be a combination of ''accelerate'' and ''escargot'' (French for ''snail'').

Agilder may be a combination of ''agile'' and ''rider''.
